jobs.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Led a team of 5 developers to design and implement a chatbot solution for ICC Vietnam. Improved service efficiency by 30% through automation and integrating NLP capabilities with IBM Watson. Developed the backend using Node.js and Express, and connected to Cisco Contact Center.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Developed and maintained multiple web applications for financial services clients using Java Spring Boot, Angular, and React. Implemented secure authentication systems and optimized database queries resulting in a 40% improvement in page load times.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Designed and developed web applications for education sector clients using JavaScript, Node.js, and MongoDB. Created responsive and user-friendly interfaces with React and integrated RESTful APIs for seamless data communication.
